metadata.title: Increase Auth API Rate Limit to 50 Requests per Minute
metadata.prd_reference: Rate limiting baseline for API routes

context.background: User requested a rate limit of 50. Healio app-side auth API rate limit is currently set to 10/min in `lib/rate-limit.ts`.

design_constraints.constraint: Only change the intended app-side rate limit constant and preserve other policies.
Document completion clearly in task XML.

instruction.step: Update the Healio `authApi` rate-limit policy max value from 10 to 50 in `healio/lib/rate-limit.ts`.
Verify the change by inspecting the policy object in code.

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Healio auth API rate-limit policy is configured to allow 50 requests per minute.
Task XML is updated with evidence and renamed `DONE_` on completion.

output_spec.commit_message: chore(healio-platform): increase auth api rate limit to 50

evidence.item: Record changed file, before/after policy value, and commit refs.

execution_tracking.completion_signal: Task is done only when state=DONE, is_done=true, completed_at is filled, verification_status=PASSED, and evidence is recorded.
